class.name: BoxContainer
class.description: Base class for Box containers. It arranges children controls vertically or horizontally, and rearranges them automatically when their minimum size changes.

method.name: add_spacer
method.description: Add a control to the box as a spacer. If [i]begin[/i] is true the spacer control will be inserted in front of other children.

method.name: get_alignment
method.description: Return the alignment of children in the container.

method.name: set_alignment
method.description: Set the alignment of children in the container(Must be one of ALIGN_BEGIN, ALIGN_CENTER or ALIGN_END).

constants.constant: Align children with beginning of the container.
Align children with center of the container.
Align children with end of the container.
